name: Seat
description: Used to describe a seat, such as a reserved seat in an event reservation.
title: Seat

fields.name: seatSection
fields.title: seatSection
fields.description: The section location of the reserved seat (e.g. Orchestra).

fields.name: seatRow
fields.title: seatRow
fields.description: The row location of the reserved seat (e.g., B).

fields.name: seatNumber
fields.title: seatNumber
fields.description: The location of the reserved seat (e.g., 27).
